main event: A slim object, 2" wide and 18" long with red lights at each end, was observed moving east then north in Tacoma, Washington on April 30, 1956.
interesting points: The object emitted a sound similar to piston engine(s),The observation lasted three minutes,Only one object was sighted,The sighting was classified as probably generated by an aircraft or possibly a balloon,The witness described the object as having no wings.
witness description: a reliable source who reported the sighting
